channel.title: BlockoScape 459 [24/7 - Stable VPS - Fast - 2006 client]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://peekarica.hj.cx/logobs.png[/img]
BlockoScape is a small community server made for people who played RuneScape between 2006 and 2007. BlockoScape has some small glitches, but they don't really infect the player in anyway. We are running on a stable VPS, and is hosted 24/7. You can play when ever you want! [b]XP rate is x28 meaning 112x per hit![/b]
[b]Joining the first time[/b] When you join the first time, you'll spawn on the Tutorial island. When ever you teleport to Lumbridge, logging out and login again you will still spawn on Tutorial island until you finish it. Keep in mind that the server is 60% finished. Everyone is free to report the glitches! ;)
Like the server? Follow the latest updates of [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=594414.20]2006-Revolution[/url] by [i]Mezzyscape562[/i].
[b]Rules[/b] 1. Cheating is never allowed, if you get caught you'll be permanently banned.
[b]Glitches[/b] 1. Wilderness level will still show up when you teleport to Lumbridge 2. Following a player doesn't work 3. You can't complete the Romeo and Juliet quest (the NPC who makes the cadava potion is not spawned) ..have you found more glitches? Report them to [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=492389]Mezzyscape562[/url].
[b]Commands[/b] We have no commands for users, members, moderators and admins..
[b]The Team[/b] Antares, - Owner X86dev, - VPS hoster
[i]Moderators[/i] Grobunca, - Moderator
[i]Members[/i] N/A
[b]Screenshots[/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img822/9084/qd6b.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img208/6246/mws2.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img600/5237/vw0.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/8057/qfa.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img259/8940/838e.png[/img]
[size=14pt][url=http://peekarica.hj.cx/BlockoScape%20Client.jar]Download Client[/url] [url=http://peekarica.hj.cx/espkc_32.zip]Download Cache Espkc32.zip[/url][/size] (In case if you already got an existing espkc32 in your windows folder. This will be fixed in the weekend. ;)
When ever you join the server, have fun! [/center]

item.title: BlockoScape 459 [24/7 - Stable VPS - Fast - 2006 client]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Antares, post:11, topic:523210”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=641762.msg4323614#msg4323614 date=1372541093]
384 did not have construction.

Edit: I don’t think this is a true 384.
[/quote]
The server named Mezzyscape is a 384 server. If you checked one of my screenshots you see the house icon. I am pretty sure the construction was in 384. I have been playing RuneScape since 2006, and construction was added in mid/end of 2006 I’d believe. Correct me if I am wrong.

yep works now

edit one word: npc/object distance…
edit #2 : prospecting is glitchy as hell
edit #3: wool spinning doesn’t work…how to get craft up :o
edit #4: dialogue heads get VERY big, same with items such as the interface for wool crafting
edit #5: are you sure this is a real 384 cache? I don’t believe construction was available then…
edit #6: don’t see a place to get a bucket to get a bucket of milk in cook assistant.

If you checked out the description, the Mezzyscape server is still not 100% completed as I described this in the intro of this thread.[/quote]
459

Read full topic

item.title: BlockoScape 459 [24/7 - Stable VPS - Fast - 2006 client]
item.dc:creator: @Antares Antares
item.description:
@Antares wrote:

[center]

BlockoScape is a small community server made for people who played RuneScape between 2006 and 2007. BlockoScape has some small glitches, but they don’t really infect the player in anyway. We are running on a stable VPS, and is hosted 24/7. You can play when ever you want! XP rate is x28 meaning 112x per hit!

Joining the first time
When you join the first time, you’ll spawn on the Tutorial island. When ever you teleport to Lumbridge, logging out and login again you will still spawn on Tutorial island until you finish it. Keep in mind that the server is 60% finished. Everyone is free to report the glitches!

Like the server? Follow the latest updates of 2006-Revolution by Mezzyscape562.

Rules

  1. Cheating is never allowed, if you get caught you’ll be permanently banned.

Glitches

  1. Wilderness level will still show up when you teleport to Lumbridge
  2. Following a player doesn’t work
  3. You can’t complete the Romeo and Juliet quest (the NPC who makes the cadava potion is not spawned)
    …have you found more glitches? Report them to Mezzyscape562.

Commands
We have no commands for users, members, moderators and admins…

The Team
Antares, - Owner
X86dev, - VPS hoster

Moderators
Grobunca, - Moderator

Members
N/A

Screenshots

[size=14pt]Download Client
Download Cache Espkc32.zip[/size]
(In case if you already got an existing espkc32 in your windows folder. This will be fixed in the weekend.

When ever you join the server, have fun!
[/center]
